name: Little April Shower
description:
LITTLE APRIL SHOWER

Life is not easy for our brave little friends that populate our gardens... Especially when it rains!
Help animals get to safety with your umbrella-leaf. Find the right moves to guide them all without getting all soaked!

CONTROLS

Move your mouse over animals to protect them from the rain.
At the end, look how many animals you saved!

👇Download the Windows Version below the description 👇
